line_1: Pernicious weed! whose scent the fair annoys
Whose Buzz the Witty and the Fair annoys,
line_2: Yet Wit ne'er tastes, and Beauty ne'er enjoys,

line_1: No keen remorse their quiet rest annoys,
line_2: No wild ambition damps the genuine joys

line_1: With laughing hours, the future ne'er annoys.
line_2: With all thy freshness, all thy flatt'ring joys,
